title: Our Declaration - main function of sentence

content.prompt: The main function of the sentence in lines 42-43 (“They wield . . . is organized”) is to

choices.label: provide evidence in support of a claim made in the first sentence of the paragraph
anticipate a possible objection to a line of reasoning presented earlier in the paragraph
weaken the claim made in the preceding sentence
elaborate on the point made in the preceding sentence

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
